Deidara's most powerful large scale bomb, that once activated becomes an enormous statue that Deidara drops on his target from above. Its explosive power was great enough to potentially destroy an entire village.<ref>Third Databook, page 245</ref>

In its first known demonstration, Deidara had already prepared the explosive clay for this attack. Once activated, the bomb instantaneously increases its proportions before being subsequently dropped, where it extends both its "arms" outwards until they are completely horizontal.

== Trivia ==
* "C-3", also known as Composition C-3, is a yellow, putty-like Composition C plastic explosive developed during the end of the [[wikipedia:Second World War|Second World War]] and used mostly through the [[wikipedia:Korean War|Korean War]].
